name: Killozapp
overview: "Ave Caesar! Moriturite salutant! you say and launch your spacecraft!" says the message at the start of each level of this shooter. Not a bad one, with some kick-butt music. Created by Jens Kleinholz and published in Golden Disk 64 1991/09. Sophisticated graphics and great sounds for your ears quickly make you forget the frustration of one or the other lost computer life.
